description: Non-material amendment to planning permission PP/23/02399 (Enlargement of 9no. self-contained studios at lower ground and upper ground floors (Class C3) through amalgamation with adjacent bedsits (sui generis) and communal areas, and a lightwell infill extension at lower ground floor. Creation of 1no. additional studio (Class C3) at lower ground floor through conversion of communal areas. Creation of 1no. additional studio (Class C3) at first floor through conversion of two bedsits (sui generis) including rear extensions, external alterations and associated works.) for inclusion of additional communal area to entrance and kitchen  layout; amended kitchen and bathroom locations; entrance door and bathroom locations altered to provide fire lobby; installation of fire lobby.
